title: 103_hr2636
content: Commissions on Regulatory Reform Act of 1993 - Requires the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to establish five commissions to review the regulations issued by the: (1) Environmental Protection Agency, (2) the Occupational Health and Safety Administration, (3) the Health Care Financing Administration. And (4) two Federal agencies selected by the Director. Establishes standards for such review.
